creator: Multiple Designers
trademark: Revalia is a trademark of Johan Kallas, Mihkel Virkus.
license_desciption: This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
description: Revalia is a display sans-serif typeface design, loosely based on the packaging labels of 20th century canned goods. The design has a high x-height, wide letter shapes and the design flirts with medieval letterforms. To contribute to the project contact Johan Kallas and Mihkel Virkus.
